dict.acceptation: 检查，核对；制止，抑制；在…上打勾；
核实，查核；中止；打勾；[象棋]将一军；

sent.orig: CHECK statements end the current processing block.
sent.trans: 如果条件为假，则CHECK关键字结束当前过程块。

sent.orig: Check back we are constantly adding more items, and as always, thanks for at our auctions!
sent.trans: Check回我们在不断地增加更多的项目，并一如既往地为我们的拍卖看的感谢！

sent.orig: Check my feedback to read the comments from people who already purchased this yarn.
sent.trans: Check我的反馈意见由人谁读这已经购买纱线的意见。

sent.orig: Check my feedback rating and bid with confidence!
sent.trans: Check并重新登录我的信用度和信心出价！

sent.orig: The process of edit check includes edit check specifications design, edit check programming, validation and implementation.
sent.trans: 编辑检查步骤包括：制定编辑检查清单、对编辑检查进行编程和验证、运行编辑检查。
